root

Class Battle

  • java.lang.Object
    • root.Battle

  • public class Battle
extends java.lang.Object
    This class handles battles done by 2 users. Their monsters try to inflict damage each round and the first one to have 0 health is the loser.

    • Constructor Summary

      Constructors

      Battle()

      • doBattle

        public java.util.ArrayList<java.lang.String> doBattle(User u1,
                                             User u2,
                                             Monster m1,
                                             Monster m2)
        Initiates a battle between the given monsters.
        Parameters:
        u1 - The owner of monster 1.
        u2 - The owner monster 2.
        m1 - The monster of the user who made the request.
        m2 - The monster of the user who received request.

      • attack

        public void attack(Monster atkMon,

        One monster attacks the other, checks if they reached 0 health.
        Parameters:
        atkMon - The attacking monster
        defMon - The defending monster

      • atkSuccess

        public boolean atkSuccess(Monster defMon)
        A defending monster has a defence chance of evading an attack.
        Parameters:
        defMon - The defending monster
        Returns:
        True if the attack connected
